name: homem de negócios
description:
comissioned game for indiepocalypse 36 (go check out the other amazing work in there an other issues of the zine!!!)

a group of businessman just arrived in delfino square, and they want to make sure they own all the coins around here. 

traditional laws of physics don't apply for business.

controls:

left stick or wasd: move businessman
right stick or ijkl: move camera
mouse: interact
